questions.question: The Company Information page is where you can find:
options: Information on important limits such as data and file usage

questions.question: What are the three main categories in the Setup menu?
What is an easy way to find what you're looking for in the Setup menu?
options: Type the first few letters of what you're looking for in the Quick Find box.
Click headings and subheadings until you find what you're looking for.
Click one of the main categories in the Setup menu, then look at the page to the right.
